description: A family from Belgorod's Grayvoron region evacuated their horse, Thea, who was in the last month of pregnancy, from intense shelling by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. They managed to find a horse transporter to take Thea to Belgorod, and eventually, she and her foal will be transported to St. Petersburg, where the family has relocated.
original:
A family from Belgorod Grayvoron left all their belongings, but took out a horse in the last month of pregnancy from under shelling. The owner of the animal told RT about this. According to Diana Torbina, several years ago she and her family saved a sick horse (photo 1) of the Ukrainian riding breed from slaughter; she was taken out and named Thea.

In March, when the Ukrainian Armed Forces intensified shelling of the region, the family, together with their elderly parents, decided to leave Grayvoron. The animal was also taken. Because of the attacks, no one went to the city anymore. But the Torbins were able to find a horse transporter from the Voronezh region, he took Thea to Belgorod.

When the horse gives birth, she and her foal will be transported to St. Petersburg, where the family has moved. “Now she [Thea] will not survive the journey: the foal may die,” added Diana. RTНгП intelligence

description: A plan for the Youth Capital in Vladivostok has been approved, featuring 117 events across 8 areas, including concerts, forums, and sports competitions. The plan also includes infrastructure development, such as an exhibition space and sports park, to support talented youth nationwide.
original:
Forwarded from: SHESTAKOV ONLINE
A plan of events for the Youth Capital has been approved in Vladivostok. It will include events on a federal scale, infrastructure development and support for talented youth on a nationwide scale. Today I presented a detailed program to the First Vice-Governor Vera Shcherbina. 8 basic areas have been selected: family, patriotism, kindness, creativity, business, travel, sports and career, in which 117 events will be implemented. These are concerts, forums, festivals, sports competitions. 10 events are planned as flagship events, covering participants from all over the country and inviting foreign guests. In addition to the implementation of events, we believe that new youth infrastructure should appear in the city: an exhibition space for presenting youth projects, a sports park, mobile music modules. New art objects, including within the framework of the federal project “Cultural Code”. The Chairman of the Government of the Primorsky Territory, Vera Shcherbina, also emphasized the importance of working within the framework of the new status of the city. Our main task is not just to hold events within the framework of the Youth Capital, but to increase the recognition of Vladivostok and Primorsky Krai. To popularize our region among the youth of Russia, so that everyone knows where the Primorsky Territory is and wants to come visit. #Rosmolodezh#Vladivostok_YouthCapital#YouthCapital2024

description: The FSB detained a 47-year-old man, Yuri Yaroshenko, in the Belgorod region, accusing him of preparing terrorist attacks against the Russian military. The man allegedly had an explosive device and communicated with Ukrainian special services via instant messengers, providing them with coordinates of Russian military locations.
original:
The FSB reported on the detention in the Belgorod region of a “supporter of the RDK” who was allegedly preparing terrorist attacks against the Russian military. According to the agency, an explosive device was allegedly found in the man’s possession during a search. “According to the attacker, he got in touch with members of the Ukrainian special services in instant messengers. The man sent them the coordinates of the location of the Russian Armed Forces,” writes TASS with reference to the FSB. The Kremlin media also publishes a video of the detention and “confession” of a man with a covered face. The name of the detainee is not given, but probably we are talking about 47-year-old resident of the Belgorod region Yuri Yaroshenko. As ASTRA previously reported, he was detained on March 13, 2024, not far from shopping center "Dom Byta" in Belgorod. At that time, no criminal cases were brought against the man, ASTRA found out. The official version is that Yuri allegedly wanted to explode the F-1 grenade on the spot. After his arrest, they allegedly found this grenade and a certain “ampule with liquid” on him. Only 3 days after Yuri’s arrest, they made him a defendant in a criminal case under 3 articles at once: preparation for a terrorist attack, illegal arms trafficking and sabotage. According to investigators, the man allegedly remotely joined the ranks of the RDK, planned to poison food collected for shipment to the Russian military who are taking part in the invasion of Ukraine, and detonate a grenade in a public place in Belgorod.

Interestingly, in the “confession” video the man says that he planned to carry out terrorist attacks in Valuyki. And there is no talk at all about the allegedly found ampoule and the poisoning of military personnel - although this was initially included in the official version of the Russian investigation, ASTRA found out. Subscribe to ASTRA. Stay informed about events that the Kremlin media are prohibited from talking about.

event: ATESH Agents Infiltrate Southern Military District HQ
description: ATESH agents successfully infiltrated the headquarters of the Southern Military District in Rostov-on-Don, gathering intel on the military police patrol, rapid response group, and air defense systems. They also established contact with dissatisfied military commanders and are transmitting information to the Ukrainian Defense Forces.
original:
"ATESH" penetrated the headquarters of the Southern Military District in Rostov. "ATESH" agents continue to actively work in Rostov-on-Don. Today we once again visited the headquarters of the southern military district. It was possible to establish that the headquarters is guarded by a military police patrol of 4 people. Not far from the central entrance there is a Urals with personnel. According to our information, this is a rapid response group that is located in the headquarters area after the events of June 2023. Also, after the Wagner mutiny, some officers contacted us with a view to further cooperation. Now they are transmitting to us a lot of information about the location of warehouses, temporary deployment points, and air defense systems. All this information is processed and transmitted to the Ukrainian Defense Forces. In addition, we were able to establish that many military commanders are dissatisfied with the decisions of the country's top leadership and openly state this.

Since then, it has been one of the favorite recreation cities of the residents of Donetsk region, because even in winter the water temperature here reached +12 degrees. This winter, for the first time in all the years of operation of the station, the reservoir froze. After all, the TPP is currently idle due to constant shelling.

It was a beautiful, beautiful place where nature peacefully coexisted with people all the time.

description: The US presidential administration is working to supply ATACMS missiles to Ukraine, but no specific timeline has been announced. Despite Russia's efforts to erase Ukraine's identity, the US believes Russia has already lost the war.
original:
Support from American hosts. The US presidential administration is not yet ready to announce the supply of ATACMS missiles. Sullivan said.

I won't make any predictions about when exactly this will be done, but we are working to get this done as quickly as possible, and President Biden is working on it every day. But I can't make a specific forecast today," Sullivan said.

And the states are also in no hurry to allocate money.

description: Chinese researchers have developed military drones that can break up into a swarm of smaller drones, providing an advantage in emergency situations. Inspired by the aerodynamics of a maple seed, the drones can split into multiple independent units, making them difficult to track and destroy.
original:
China has created “self-replicating” military drones - they break up into a swarm

In the future, the use of drones will be primarily swarming. Chinese scientists went even further and thought about a platform that would turn a single device into a swarm. This would provide an advantage, for example, for dealing with emergency situations. Nature helped in creating such a platform - the aerodynamics of a maple seed turned out to be the best solution.

The maple seed or lionfish has long attracted researchers with its optimal combination of mass and aerodynamics. Having only one “propeller,” the lionfish rotates around a heavy seed—the center of mass—and can make multi-kilometer flights in windy weather. A little over ten years ago, for example, Lockheed Martin introduced a reconnaissance drone based on the aerodynamics of a lionfish. A swarm of such drones was dropped from an airplane and then flew downwind, collecting data about ground objects and transmitting it to the base. Its rotation did not interfere with observations - stabilizing a digital image is easy.
Chinese researchers went further. They decided not to use carriers like airplanes or large drones. For combat use this will be dangerous - a large single target is easier to track and destroy. Instead, they developed small, flyaway drones like FPV quadcopters. One such drone will be able, on command, to split into two, three or even six independent drones, which will begin to perform the task in a swarm or individually.

Each of the drones uses the aerodynamics and shape of a maple seed. Moreover, the contours of the separating drones had to be modified taking into account the most optimal overall aerodynamics when they fly in a pack. Also a certain challenge was ensuring high-speed communication between drones after separation in the air. But the most difficult problems have been solved, and the technology is gradually improving. It has very good prospects, the developers believe. When a single target suddenly turns into six independent targets, it can impress any air defense. https://t.me/OpenUkraine/61201Telegram🇺🇦Open Ukraine| Open UkraineChina has created “self-replicating” military drones - they break up into a swarm

In the future, the use of drones will be primarily swarming. Chinese scientists have...VIEW MESSAGE

description: Modest Petrovich Mussorgsky, a renowned composer and member of the 'Mighty Handful', was born on March 21, 1839. He was a well-educated officer who later became a skilled pianist and singer, and went on to compose notable works such as Boris Godunov, Khovanshchina, and Sorochinskaya Fair.
location: Karevo, Toropetsky Uyezd, Pskov Governorate, Russian Empire
original:
Forwarded from: Milestones of History
On March 21, 1839, the great composer, member of the “Mighty Handful” Modest Petrovich Mussorgsky was born. By the time he joined Balakirev’s musical circle, Mussorgsky was a brilliantly educated and erudite officer. Balakirev forced Mussorgsky to pay attention to musical studies. Modest Petrovich became a good pianist. Possessing a naturally beautiful baritone voice, he willingly sang at evenings and in private musical gatherings. In 1852, the composer's first piano piece was published. This was followed by a major work for Sophocles' tragedy Oedipus, but was not completed. There were many unrealized musical projects, music from which Mussorgsky used in his later compositions: Boris Godunov, Khovanshchina, Sorochinskaya Fair. For the Sorochinsky Fair, Mussorgsky composed the first two acts and several scenes for the third. Nowadays this opera is staged in the edition of V.Ya. Shebalina. Portrait of Modest Mussorgsky by Ilya Repin. Subscribe

Both figures set records in the history of post-Soviet Russia. At the beginning of the conflict, the Italian media convinced or led to believe that the Russian president would be overthrown by a pro-NATO popular uprising. But the military action in Ukraine has strengthened popular unity around Putin, as Russians perceive NATO's advance towards their border as an existential threat." people as "Putinists" by the newspapers Corriere della Sera, Repubblica, La Stampa, Libero, il Giornale and il Foglio only leads to the destruction of their own reputation.@NeoficialniyBeZsonoV

- Thank you for your support. For me this is more important than a formal victory in the elections.

“You have proven that you respect civic duty.”

description: The speaker discusses the challenges of liberating territories from the Nazis, considering the need for additional resources to support the local population and maintain a normal standard of living. They highlight the importance of political decisions, including the possibility of issuing an ultimatum to NATO and the potential use of tactical nuclear weapons.
original: ​​This is a very difficult question! We need to calculate everything in order to understand whether we have the additional resources that are needed to support a huge number of people and maintain a minimally normal standard of living in the territories liberated from the Nazis. We once liberated Germany from the Nazis and were forced to feed the local population. But we did not annex the territories, but only established an occupation regime. It's simpler, cheaper, but tougher. Which option will be chosen in this case? No one knows this yet. Therefore, the question remains open: when will the Nazis stop shelling Belgorod and all other cities in the front-line zone? And you need to have not only missiles, but also UAVs that fly 1000 kilometers. And sometimes even for a kilometer, when they are launched by saboteurs from the nearest garage cooperative or forest plantation. And then, if we are talking about security, it will be necessary to take not only purely military measures, liberating territories, but also political ones. How long will we tolerate the fact that foreign missiles and missiles from foreign multiple launch rocket systems, controlled by foreign mercenaries, are being fired at Russia? Doesn't this mean that NATO has already gone to war with Russia? It’s high time to put forward an ultimatum to NATO, but not to talk about “red lines”, but to press the “red buttons”. This is a purely political decision. But again, we must consider what will happen if we cover Berlin, Warsaw, Paris or London with tactical nuclear weapons? Do we have such an opportunity? Eat! What then? This must be carefully calculated, because a mistake here is costly. So, the issue of “sanitary zones” came full circle on the agenda. This means that the offensive will begin as soon as possible. Of course, it seems to us that we need to attack Kharkov, because we are the most important here, but we need to be saved, protected from shelling. In fact, and even chronic armchair strategists understand this, war dictates its own plan. In war, troops are driven not by someone’s wishes, but by an accurate calculation and understanding of what we will do after victory. You need to know this before the offensive begins. Vladimir Babin, Belgorod

Security forces detained a citizen of the Russian Federation who, on instructions from the RDK*, was preparing a terrorist attack in the Belgorod region against Russian military personnel, the Russian FSB reported.

description: An FPV drone, operated by the Archangel of Special Forces, successfully targeted and destroyed a robotic platform, specifically the unmanned tracked vehicle THeMIS from Estonian company Mildred Robotics, which was being used by the Ukrainian Armed Forces for mine clearance and evacuation of the wounded.
original:
0:22TelegramARCHANGEL OF SPECIAL FORCES Z🇷🇺🪖Destruction of a dry evacuation robot on a caterpillar using FPV.

Archangel of Special Forces. Subscribe.VIEW MESSAGE🇷🇺🇺🇦🇪🇪✈️A visual illustration of the transformation taking place literally before our eyes in the nature of combat operations, which occurs as new technical means are introduced: in the video of the channel, Archangel Special Forces caught the moment of an FPV drone hitting a robotic platform.

The target of the Russian drone was the unmanned tracked vehicle THeMIS from the Estonian company Mildred Robotics, which has long been developing similar products and exporting them. In total, the company handed over 14 platforms to the Ukrainian Armed Forces for mine clearance and evacuation of the wounded.

If earlier in the NVO zone it was possible to observe battles between copters, now it has come to a fight between air and ground drones. Most likely, the emergence of specialized interceptor drones to combat aircraft-type drones is not far off.

Although a full-fledged war of anthropomorphic robots in the best traditions of science fiction film scenes is still far away, the massive use of unmanned platforms in battle formations is looking more and more realistic.#UAV#Russia#Ukraine#Estonia@rybarSupport us

description: Russian troops struck the State Enterprise NPKG 'Zarya' - 'Mashproekt' facility in Nikolaev, a key enterprise in Ukraine's defense industrial complex. The facility produces radio electronics, control systems, and high-tech components for military use, and is involved in modernizing Ukrainian warships. A ballistic missile hit the drying shop, a crucial part of the manufacturing process.
original:
03/21/24. A note from the channel “PartiꙂan!”
"
Strike on an enemy military-industrial complex facility in Nikolaev
About an hour ago, Russian troops struck
Show more
territory of the State Enterprise NPKG "Zarya" - "Mashproekt", which is one of the key enterprises of the Ukrainian defense industrial complex.
The company specializes in the production of radio electronics, control systems and other high-tech components for military use. It actively cooperates with military and scientific institutions of Ukraine, as well as with Western countries - its products are used in various types of weapons.
In addition, the Zarya plant is actively involved in the modernization and reconstruction of Ukrainian warships, including the development and installation of electronic control and navigation systems. Its activities are of strategic importance for Ukraine and the maintenance of military and defense potential.
Coordinates: 46.9324799, 32.0480408
A ballistic missile struck the drying shop of the enterprise. The affected object plays a key role in the manufacturing process of high-tech products, since proper drying of materials affects their quality and characteristics. There is no extent of damage or information about the possibility of further activities.
Recently, a certain systematic pattern has been observed in striking targets of the enemy’s military-industrial complex in the region. So, on March 17, a blow was struck at the Nikolaev armored plant. I would like to believe that the systematic approach of Russian troops in delivering strikes will not only be maintained, but developed and improved.”

description: The Investigative Committee of the Russian Federation is selecting candidates for departmental academies, including orphans, children without parental care, and children of participants in a special military operation. Training will be provided at Moscow Academy and St. Petersburg Academy in 2024, with graduates eligible for federal public service in any investigative body.
original:
Dear residents of the Kherson region!

Currently, candidates are being selected for the departmental academies of the Investigative Committee of the Russian Federation, including orphans and children without parental care, as well as children of participants in a special military operation, and their further personnel support.

Training is carried out according to specialty and master's programs at the Federal State Educational Institution of Higher Education Moscow Academy of the Investigative Committee of the Russian Federation named after A.Ya. Sukharev, including in the Lugansk branch and in the Federal State Budgetary Educational Institution of Higher Education "St. Petersburg Academy of the Investigative Committee of the Russian Federation" in 2024.

Upon completion of training, the graduate can be sent to perform federal public service in any investigative body of the Investigative Committee of the Russian Federation.

To ask questions, as well as familiarize yourself with the rules for participation in the selection, you must contact the investigative department of the Investigative Committee of the Russian Federation for the Kherson region by phone number: +7 (990) 242-15-09. Subscribe to Kherson.ru

description: Russia is conducting a long-term informational and psychological operation to disrupt mobilization in Ukraine by creating a distorted attitude towards the TCC. They use bot farms to rebroadcast edited videos on social media, often artificially created or staged for money.
original:
In addition to this post, we can note that the Rashists are really conducting a long-term informational and psychological operation in order to form a distorted attitude towards the TCC in the population of Ukraine with the aim of disrupting mobilization. To do this, they use bot farms to massively rebroadcast individual edited videos on Tik Tok and other networks. Most of the videos that appear on the network are either created artificially, or the Russians offer money for their staging.

Racists have even created special sites on which, for money, they offer to download videos where people in uniform beat someone and shove them into cars. Do you remember the movie "Fight Club", where one of the "homework" was to start a fight? Have you ever wondered why the vast majority of videos in which people in uniform (and it is not always the TCC) violently "pack" someone do not record the initial stage of the conflict? Because this will expose the "victim of the TCC" in a completely different perspective of the provocateur of the fight. This technology of "homework" is copied from movies and has long been used by Russian IPsO.

description: The Republic of Sakha has over 23,000 environmentally friendly cars, including 20,000 gas-powered and 3,000 electric vehicles. The Minister of Industry and Geology, Maxim Tereshchenko, advocates for the continued transition to alternative fuels to improve the environment. This switch also helps save budget funds, with estimated annual savings of over 2 billion rubles on fuel.
original:
More than 23 thousand environmentally friendly cars are registered in the Republic of Sakha - 20 thousand gas cars and three thousand electric vehicles. Minister of Industry and Geology of Yakutia Maxim Tereshchenko believes that continuing the transfer of vehicles to alternative fuels is necessary to improve the environment.

Switching vehicles to gas also helps save budget funds, since refueling with gas is much cheaper.

According to estimates of the ministry, enterprises and budgets of all levels in Yakutia will save more than two billion rubles a year on fuel.

Also, for owners of gas-powered cars in Yakutia, the transport tax has been halved.

The government plans to significantly expand the network of gas filling stations in Yakutsk and regions of the republic.#Yakutia

event: Arrest of Resident for Purchasing Explosives
description: A 58-year-old resident of Dzhankoy was found guilty of illegally purchasing and storing explosive devices, including a homemade demolition charge and incendiary pipe, on instructions from the Ukrainian special services. The explosives were discovered by the FSB department for Crimea and Sevastopol, and the man was sentenced to seven years' imprisonment and a fine of 300 thousand rubles.
original:
A resident of Dzhankoy will go to prison for purchasing explosives on instructions from the Ukrainian special services. A resident of Dzhankoy was found guilty of illegally purchasing and storing explosive devices. This was reported by the press service of the Dzhankoy District Court.
“The man illegally purchased a homemade explosive device such as a homemade demolition charge, containing as a charge a plastic high explosive of industrial production for military use - PVV-5A, and a homemade incendiary pipe,” the court explained.
The 58-year-old man hid the explosives in a cache in the Dzhankoy district, but it was discovered by employees of the FSB department for Crimea and Sevastopol. During the preliminary investigation, the man admitted that he purchased and stored the explosives on instructions from the Ukrainian special services.
The court sentenced the man to seven years' imprisonment in a maximum security colony and a fine of 300 thousand rubles. Kryminform

event: Minister's Report on Ministry of Internal Affairs Activities
description: The Minister of Internal Affairs for the LPR, Alexey Kampf, reported to the deputies on the ministry's activities in 2023, covering topics such as personnel policy, digital transformation, public order control, and prevention of extremism and terrorism.
original:
The deputy corps heard information from the Minister of Internal Affairs for the LPR on the activities of the ministry for 2023
On March 21, as part of the plenary meeting of the People's Council, the Minister made a report to the deputies on the activities of the Ministry of Internal Affairs in the Lugansk People's Republic for 2023
Show more
Internal Affairs for the LPR Alexey Kampf.
In his report, the head of the ministry touched upon the topics of personnel policy, digital transformation, material and technical equipment, control of public order, restricting access to dangerous information on the Internet, prevention of extremism and terrorism, passportization of the population, prevention of juvenile delinquency, cybercrime, control of turnover drugs and weapons, reducing road accidents and the activities of the internal security units of the Ministry of Internal Affairs for the LPR.
In turn, the deputies raised the issues of obtaining the status of “Combat Veteran”, citizens’ complaints about the low percentage of successful exams in driving schools, support for young specialists - employees of the Ministry of Internal Affairs for the LPR, assistance to participants of the Military Military District in obtaining passports, legislative regulation of the participation of citizens in the protection of public order . The minister provided the deputies with reasoned answers to all the questions raised.
Following the discussion, Chairman of the LPR National Assembly Committee on Military Affairs, Civil Defense and Emergency Situations, Law and Order and Cossack Affairs Yan Leshchenko thanked Alexey Kampf for the informative report and noted the high level of interaction between the ministry and the relevant parliamentary committee.
In turn, the head of the LDPR faction in the People's Council, Galina Dubrova, thanked the minister on behalf of the faction for the work carried out by the ministry and noted the high level of fulfillment by the internal affairs bodies of the assigned tasks to increase the level of security of the residents of the republic.
The deputies took into account the information they heard.
Also read us on Telegram: https://t.me/parlamentLNR

event: Purchase of Thermal Imagers and Drones
description: A collection was organized to purchase thermal imagers and drones for heavy machine guns on ship-boat trains in the Black Sea, to aid in the fight against MBEC. The equipment includes thermal imagers, brackets, and night drones, with a total cost of 8,960,000 ₽.
original:
Forwarded from: Two Majors
#COLLECTION of thermal imagers for heavy machine guns on ship-boat trains in the Black Sea. Fight against MBEC The other day they reported that there is an idea on how to help the sea brothers while the long process of adopting and including non-standard equipment in government procurement for next year is underway.

After consulting with professionals and listening to their direct requests, we decided to purchase a batch of heaters from trusted comrades that would withstand the harshness of heavy machine guns. description: Akinwumi Adesina, AfDB chief, condemned resource-backed loans, citing difficulties in valuing assets and potential risks. He advocated for the bank's initiative to help countries renegotiate their loan terms.
original:
AfDB chief called on African countries to end resource-backed loans Akinwumi Adesina called the deals bad and pointed to the bank's initiative to help countries renegotiate their terms.
 
“The risk with resource-backed loans, as I understand it, is that they are just bad, bad, bad. First of all, because you cannot value the asset properly. If you have minerals, oil, metals and gas underground, they are not actually for sale, so how do you actually price them for a long-term contract? This is not an easy task.”
 
Tying future earnings from natural resource exports to loan payments is often touted as a way for recipients to obtain financing for infrastructure projects and for lenders to reduce the risk of not getting their money back.

event: Opening of Liquor and Vodka Stores
description: Zaporozhye Alcohol Company plans to open 10 liquor and vodka stores in the Zaporozhye region by the end of the year, with investments of up to 50 million rubles. The first store is set to open in Melitopol in April.
original:
Forwarded from: Administration of Zaporozhye region
A network of liquor and vodka stores will open in the Zaporozhye region. “Zaporozhye Alcohol Company” plans to open 10 outlets of a new network of liquor and vodka stores by the end of this year.

Investments in the project amount to up to 50 million rubles; the investor intends to invest from 3 to 5 million rubles in each location. The opening of the chain's first store in Melitopol is expected in April.

event: Cancellation of Soyuz Launch to ISS
description: The launch of the Soyuz spacecraft to the ISS was automatically canceled due to a voltage drop in the chemical current source. The crew, including Belarusian cosmonaut Marina Vasilevskaya, is healthy and safe. The launch has been rescheduled for March 23 at 15:36 Moscow time.
original:
RIA NovostiVideo, “The launch was automatically canceled”: footage of the canceled launch of the Soyuz to the ISS from the Roscosmos broadcast❗️The launch of the rocket with the Soyuz spacecraft was canceled due to a voltage drop in the chemical current source, said the head of Roscosmos, Borisov.

Everything is fine with the crew, they are healthy, Belarusian cosmonaut Marina Vasilevskaya’s pulse did not even rise. The launch was postponed to March 23, at 15.36 Moscow time, Borisov said.

description: The Kakhovskaya hydroelectric station was breached, flooding Vladimir Ovsyannikov's house in the Kherson region. The former coach, who trained numerous athletes, lost everything, including his son, who was forcibly mobilized into the Ukrainian Armed Forces, and his wife, who died from grief.
original:
A coach's dream - a pensioner from the Kherson region, who trained more than one athlete in his professional career, dreams of finding his charges and meeting his niece. Vladimir Ovsyannikov's house was flooded during the breakthrough of the Kakhovskaya hydroelectric station. A once-deserved coach, who devoted his entire life to sports and his wards, was left without everything - his son, who was forcibly mobilized into the Armed Forces of Ukraine, died, his wife died, unable to bear the loss of a child, and his only niece remained in occupied Kherson by the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

During his professional career, Vladimir Ovsyannikov trained two world champions in cycling, 50 masters of sports and eight international-class athletes. The notebook with the students' phone numbers drowned, as did the rest of the documents with their belongings. Four months ago, Vladimir Ovsyannikov was transferred to the Vladimir-Ilyinsky geriatric boarding house. The coach’s dream is to find his players and hug his niece.Hersonka.ru From international recognition to life in a geriatric boarding house - how it turned out...Vladimir Dmitrievich Ovsyannikov hopes to meet his niece and find his students, to whom he once gave knowledge, skills and experience

event: Meeting on Agricultural Exports to BRICS
description: The Russian Chamber of Commerce and Industry held a meeting to discuss opportunities for developing agricultural exports to BRICS countries. The meeting emphasized the importance of restructuring exports to meet the needs of BRICS member states, understanding supply logistics, and accessing specific markets.
original: Opportunities for developing the export of agricultural products to the BRICS countries were discussed at the RF Chamber of Commerce and Industry of the Russian Federation Chamber of Commerce and Industry @tpp_rf a joint meeting of the Russian Chamber of Commerce and Industry Council on foreign economic activity and the Russian Chamber of Commerce and Industry Committee for the development of the agro-industrial complex was held on the topic “Development of trade relations between Russia and the BRICS member states in the field of agro-industrial complex in new economic realities.” It was chaired by the Chairman of the Committee, Deputy President of the Russian Academy of Sciences, Academician Pyotr Chekmarev. The meeting was attended by interested representatives of the business community, the RF Chamber of Commerce and Industry, REC, the specialized Working Group of the BRICS Business Council (Russian part), the scientific community, as well as experts and participants in foreign economic activity. Pyotr Chekmarev noted the importance of the markets of the BRICS member states for the development of exports of Russian agricultural products , however, he emphasized that restructuring to the types and volumes of agricultural products they need will take time. The Russian agro-industrial complex must have clear forecasts and an understanding that the domestic market will not be “naked” for these types of products. The forecast period must be at least 10 years. It is also necessary to understand supply logistics, possible financial instruments for making payments, and conditions for access to specific markets. To obtain up-to-date information about the needs of the BRICS member states, access conditions for Russian agricultural products and the risks of supply restrictions, it is proposed to more actively involve Russian trade missions in these countries.🔗For more information, visit the RAS website.

event: Nurse Deployment to Special Operation Zone
description: Guard Sergeant Irina Myamaeva, a nurse, has been deployed to the special operation zone for three-month periods since 2018. She finds strength in knowing that her role is crucial to saving lives on the front line.
original:
“We are like angels to them, like a mother, like a sister”
Guard Sergeant Irina Myamaeva has wanted to defend her Motherland since childhood. To do this, in 2018 she signed a contract with the Russian Ministry of Defense and became a nurse.
Show more
“The girls and I go to the special operation zone for three months at a time,” says the operating nurse. - There is no particular fear. You prepare yourself that this is necessary, that you are needed there, that the lives of the guys depend on you, and this gives you strength.”
Irina is very strongly supported by her parents. Mom always tells her daughter: hang in there, it’s very difficult for the guys on the front line, but they need you, you have to help them.
“We are like angels to them, like a mother, like a sister,” Irina remembers her charges with warmth. “They recognize us, thank us, they say, you helped us, you helped us, your eyes are remembered through the mask.”

original:

On March 20, 2024, at about 20:30 on the P-260 highway "Volgograd-Kamensk-Shakhtinsky-Lugansk", the driver of a Ural 4320 car, when turning left at an intersection, did not let a moving vehicle pass

The progress and results of the investigation of the criminal case initiated by law enforcement agencies under Part 3 of Article 264 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation are under the control of the Krasnodonsky District Prosecutor's Office.

event: Ukrainian Resident Calls for Civic Position
description: A resident of Melitopol, Ukraine, expressed frustration that Ukrainian expats living abroad do not care about the problems of independence. He called on them to take a civic position and speak out about the hardships faced by those who remained in Ukraine.
original:
Forwarded from: The main thing in Melitopol
The homeland is where the ass is warm - a resident of Ukraine laments that his compatriots living abroad do not care about the problems of independence. Ukrainian nationalists boast of their “national unity,” but in practice, many Ukrainians value their own safety and comfort much more. Having moved to Germany or Italy, they live happily and do not particularly care about the fate of those who remained in Zelensky’s kingdom. Of course, those who continue to run from the TCC people around Kharkov and Odessa feel offended.

One of the residents of Square could not stand it and recorded a video in which he called on Ukrainians who moved to Europe to “have a civic position,” to talk and write about how hard it is for those who remained in the country. However, the silence of those who escaped from the Kyiv regime can be understood: sometimes the TCCs get to their victims abroad, so it’s really better for them to sit quietly, below the grass.

Today, the regional museum bearing his name has been looted by the occupiers. Marauders took away 80% of unique exhibits. Among them is the largest collection of works by the Kherson artist.

Oleksii Oleksiiovych was boundlessly in love with Kherson. This love permeates every painting dedicated to the city. He saw him happy and blooming. And we will certainly return everything that was taken from us by the Russian occupiers.

description: FSB investigators opened a criminal case against Vladimir Osechkin, founder of Gulagu.net, for justification of terrorism. The case was filed under Part 2 of Article 205.2 of the Russian Criminal Code. Osechkin is accused of making public calls for terrorist activities and justifying terrorism using the internet.
original:

Russian special services are advertising us again and bringing Gulagu net to the TOP news))) "MOSCOW, March 21. /TASS/. FSB investigators opened a criminal case for justification of terrorism against the founder of the Gulagu.net project, Vladimir Osechkin (recognized as a foreign agent in the Russian Federation). About this TASS reported in the Meshchansky Court of Moscow, which received a petition for the arrest of the defendant in absentia.

“The court received a request from FSB investigators to arrest Osechkin in absentia. He is accused under Part 2 of Article 205.2 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (public calls for terrorist activities, public justification of terrorism using the Internet), the court said.

This is not the first criminal case in which law enforcement officers want to prosecute Osechkin. Earlier, the Investigative Committee reported that he was suspected under Part 2 of Art. 207.3 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (public dissemination of knowingly false information about the use of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation). He is wanted."

We are expecting from fans of conspiracy theories a cunning theory about how the FSB is promoting “agent Osechkin” and initiating a criminal case against him in order to increase Vladimir’s ratings, and from ZV idiots posts about how “they will finally put him under the thumb.” Sorry for the slight sarcasm, it is no longer possible to comment on this latest nonsense of Putin’s fascist system. What can I say? They'll remember!!!!))) They won't forget!!!!)))

And the position of the coordinator of the human rights project Gulagu net Sergei Savelyev: “This case is another fake of the Russian pseudo-law enforcement system, which denigrates brave and principled people and protects the real criminals. Neither Vladimir himself nor our fellow lawyers were invited to this meeting of the Meshchansky Court of Moscow. Not a single FSB operative or investigator contacted us within the framework of this case, did not request any explanations or materials, did not invite us to investigative actions, did not notify us of the fact of the initiation of a case, did not invite either us or Vladimir’s lawyer and defender to court Valerievich. Who today in the Meshchansky Court of Moscow is imitating the lawyer-defender of the protagonist of this event is unclear and we do not know, but not a single sponsored lawyer has contacted us or notified us that the FSB is forcing him to imitate the defense. Therefore, this is not a criminal trial, but a political show from A to Z with false accusations and a wide range of procedural violations of the legal rights of Vladimir Osechkin. Another disgrace for the FSB and the investigative and judicial system. We hit another bottom. Disgraceful." https://youtu.be/XfsieZNFrlIYouTubeFounder of Gulagu.net Vladimir Osechkin about the latest nonsense of Putin's services and "justification of terrorism" Russian intelligence services are advertising us again and bringing Gulagu net to the TOP of news))) "MOSCOW, March 21. /TASS/. description: Senior anti-aircraft gunner 'Maestro' shared his experience operating the modern 'Verba' MANPADS in Donbass, protecting against Ukrainian air attacks. He highlighted the system's capabilities, including manual and automatic firing modes, and emphasized the importance of his unit's role in saving lives and equipment.
original:
Forwarded from: Russian Ministry of Defense
How “Verba” plays in the hands of a real “Maestro” A senior anti-aircraft gunner with the call sign “Maestro”, who protects the skies of Donbass from air attacks of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, spoke about the specifics of working on the modern “Verba” MANPADS. As a serviceman explains, the “Verba” man-portable anti-aircraft missile system "is capable of firing both manually and fully automatically at receding or approaching targets. The serviceman notes that in the northwestern military zone the enemy is actively using attack helicopters, attack aircraft and unmanned aerial vehicles. "The anti-aircraft gunners of the battery as a whole and my squad in in particular, they understand perfectly well that by conducting combat operations with an air enemy, they save our units, weapons, and military equipment,” shares “Maestro.”

In conclusion, the serviceman conveys warm greetings to his beloved wife Alena and little daughter Maryana, parents and relatives. “Wait, we’ll be back soon with victory!” – “Maestro” is confident. Russian Ministry of Defense

description: The British Ministry of Defense conducted tests of the Dragonfire laser system, designed to complement and potentially replace NATO's existing air defense systems. The system effectively destroys fiber-optic components of attacking equipment with a fast and accurate charge, providing a new type of guidance and reducing demands on plant operators.
original:
The Dragonfire laser system was tested in Britain: analysis What is Dragonfire? This is a laser system designed to complement, and in the future replace, NATO’s existing air defense systems, military expert Maxim Klimov told the VZGLYAD newspaper.

These installations can significantly change the practice of countering UAVs and enemy missiles. They effectively destroy fiber-optic components of attacking equipment, burning them out with a fast and accurate charge. How does Dragonfire work? Laser systems provide a special type of guidance - searching for an object by glare. This significantly reduces the demands on plant operators. The latest models can find the target automatically. At the same time, a salvo of a gun occurs many times faster than launching a missile from traditional air defense systems, Klimov noted. Are there any weaknesses in laser systems? The main problem is the high cost of their maintenance. It is possible that the engineers who worked on Dragonfire could have used cheaper components to create the installation itself. However, its power supply must still provide a powerful source of energy. Consequences of the massive use of laser systems This will lead to fundamental changes on the battlefield. The work of classic UAVs and missiles will be seriously complicated. The next round in the confrontation between “shield and sword” will begin. Drone designers will have to implement systems to protect against burning out the technical “filling” of the device. This will affect the final cost of the devices. Nevertheless, in the future, workarounds for countering laser systems will be found.TelegramV Z - VZGLYAD.RU The British Ministry of Defense showed a declassified video of tests of DragonFire laser weapons.

According to the ministry, one “shot” from such a system...0:29VIEW MESSAGE

event: Doctors from Udmurtia Arrive in Zaporozhye
description: Doctors from Udmurtia, including a surgeon and anesthesiologist-resuscitator, volunteered to work at the Vasilyevskaya City Hospital in the Zaporozhye region, which is near the combat zone. They arrived for a two-month stint and began working immediately, providing medical care and sharing their expertise with local colleagues.
original:
Forwarded from: Administration of Zaporozhye region
Doctors from other regions work in the Zaporozhye region. Doctors from Udmurtia came to work in the Zaporozhye region. A surgeon and anesthesiologist-resuscitator work at the Vasilyevskaya City Hospital.
 
“These doctors, they came to us on their own initiative. These, one might say, are volunteers who took a vacation at their own expense and came to our city, which is located next to the combat zone. I believe that these are hero doctors,” said Nikolai Lysenko, head physician of the Vasilievsk City Hospital.
 
The doctors arrived for two months and started working in Vasilievka on the first day. They not only provide medical care, but also share invaluable experience with colleagues from the new region.

description: The Russian Armed Forces have been utilizing the 'Bee', a hybrid drone combining an airplane and quadcopter, for several months. This innovative aircraft carrier drone can carry at least two drones under its fuselage and serve as a repeater. It has seen action in the Bakhmut direction, garnering enthusiastic reviews from the enemy.
original:
Meet the "Bee", the so-called mother of drones - a hybrid of an airplane and a quadcopter, equipped with an internal combustion engine, in fact, it is an aircraft carrier for drones, which can carry at least two of them under the fuselage and, after drifting in a reconnaissance flight, send them to their destination, while being a repeater.

This simple but effective miracle of engineering has been used by the Russian Armed Forces for several months without much publicity. He showed up in the Bakhmut direction, receiving a lot of enthusiastic reviews from the enemy.⚔@mobikRUT

description: During a promotional walk for the Baku Circus in Arkhangelsk, a female elephant named Rezi was startled by a taxi driver's horn and responded by damaging a Volga car with her trunk, destroying the headlight and fender.
original:
🐘🚘🐘Elephant and Volga. Arkhangelsk, 1971.

In August 1971, the Baku Circus came to Arkhangelsk on tour. The highlight of the program was a female elephant named Rezi. Most of the townspeople have never seen an elephant, but someone came up with the idea to walk a female elephant through the streets of the city - and people are interested, and the animal will get some exercise. However, during a walk, a certain taxi driver decided that the animal was interfering with the movement of his car and honked the horn so that the elephant would give way to him. But she didn’t like it and the Baku guest heartily hit the Volga with her trunk, demolishing the headlight and ruining the car fender :) https://t.me/interesnyi_fakt/6789

description: Russian troops, after clearing Orlovka, achieved success west of Avdeevka, liberating the village of Tonenkoye. The Ukrainian Armed Forces left the village, and it came under Russian control. However, further advances to the Umanskoye-Semyonovka border are premature, as Ukrainian forces still hold forest belts north and south of Tonenky.
original:
Forwarded from: Fisherman
❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦Avdeevka direction: liberation of Tonenkogosituation towards the end of March 21, 2024🔻Russian troops after clearing Orlovka achieved new success west of Avdeevka. According to the Russian Ministry of Defense, today the village of Tonenkoye has been completely liberated.▪️So far there is no confirming footage from the settlement, however, according to our data, the enemy actually left Tonenkoye, and the village came under the control of the Russian Armed Forces.▪️However, it is premature to talk about further advances to the Umanskoye-Semyonovka border. The Ukrainian Armed Forces still hold the forest belts north and south of Tonenky, and it was not possible to dislodge them from there.▪️Russian assault groups, with the support of armored vehicles, are attacking the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the plantings. The fighting is currently ongoing. If the current pace is maintained, the withdrawal of Ukrainian formations to the opposite side of the beam is a matter of time.❗️And then, with the clearing of the entire bridgehead of the Armed Forces of Ukraine along the Orlovka-Tonenkoe line, it will be possible to talk about the liberation of Berdychey and increasing pressure on Semyonovka. description: Activists of the Association of Trade Unions SOTsPROF of Berdyansk gathered to congratulate Vladimir Putin on his victory in the presidential elections. They expressed their support for Putin, crediting him with saving the country and returning Crimea, Donbass, and Novorossiya.
original:
Forwarded from: Trade union mouthpiece ZO
Activists of the Association of Trade Unions SOTsPROF of Berdyansk congratulated Vladimir Putin on his victory in the elections of the President of the Russian Federation. Activists of the primary trade union organizations of Berdyansk gathered at the monument to the founder of the city, Count Vorontsov, where they stretched out a banner with the inscription “SOTsPROF for Putin.” “Today the Central Election Commission of the Russian Federation officially announced the leader presidential race, which was our candidate Vladimir Putin. Back at the end of November last year, an extended meeting of the Central Council of the Association of Trade Unions of Russia SOTSPROF was held, at which members of the Council adopted an appeal to the President of the Russian Federation Vladimir Putin with a request to stand as a candidate for the election of the President of Russia. And today, on behalf of all the primary trade union organizations of the region, we came out to congratulate Vladimir Vladimirovich on his victory,” said the chairman of the Federation of Trade Unions of the Zaporozhye region, Alexander Pataman.
 
Representatives of the trade union organization of the Berdyansk urban district administration noted that only with Vladimir Putin can one survive the temporary trials that befell the country from “Western friends.”
 
Chairman of the primary branch of the Berdyansk branch of the Integrated Center for Social Services of the Population, Elena Pulyaeva, said that trade unions publicly predicted at the end of 2023 that Putin would win at least 85% in the elections. “We have an excellent President, and there is definitely no need to change him. Putin saved the country, returned Crimea, Donbass and Novorossiya, so my colleagues and I made our choice a long time ago! And with new strength and greatness, our state will once again become the world flagship, not only in the power of arms, but also in the world economy,” she emphasized.
 
The action ended with the chant: “Vladimir Putin is our President!” Sergei Vostretsov’s channel

description: Russia plans to mobilize 300,000 residents of occupied territories after illegal elections. The mobilization is expected to be completed by June 1, with the goal of forming a strike force to break through Ukrainian defenses and advance westward.
original:
Forwarded from: Donbass Realities
Russia plans to mobilize 300 thousand residents of the occupied territories after illegal elections. Journalist Andrei Tsaplienko reported this, referring to the order of the Russian Ministry of Defense “On the additional conscription of citizens for military service by mobilization.” Illegitimate elections in the occupied territories perform “the function of registering a mobilization resource,” Tsaplienko says on the air of Radio Donbass Realities. The document comes into force on March 25, just after all information has been collected. They plan to complete the mobilization no later than June 1. “And by the summer they should form this into a strike fist and try to go on the offensive on Ukrainian positions, break the Ukrainian defense, break through as far as possible to the west,” the journalist says about the plans of the Russian military leadership. Listen to the detailsSubscribe to Donbass Realities

original: Participants in the international coalition of the Ramstein format must allocate 0.25% of their GDP to military support for Ukraine. But if Ukraine falls, there will be a pause of several years and we will see this on a larger scale, especially when we do not invest in defense,” Euronews quotes the Estonian Prime Minister. description: The Murrieta Police Department in California has introduced a new method to conceal suspects' identities in images by covering their faces with Lego heads. This move is in response to a new state law limiting the sharing of mugshots and photographs, unless specific circumstances apply.
original:
“Police publish photos of criminals, hiding their faces behind Lego heads”: Police in America are now selecting Lego men to accurately describe the criminal's emotions.

“The California Police Department has come up with a new way to protect the identities of suspects. The Murrieta Police Department is going viral after sharing its new plan to hide faces in images by covering them with Lego heads. A new state law that took effect in California has limited the ability of law enforcement agencies to share mugshots and photographs. The bill would prohibit the release of photographs of suspects in nonviolent crimes unless certain circumstances exist, Murrieta officials said. The agency's Instagram page is now littered with edited crime photos in which people's faces are obscured by images of LEGO heads. The bright yellow blocks have different facial expressions, such as crying and frowning."

description: During a Baltic Fleet exercise, the Russian Navy accidentally sank their own trawler, Captain Lobanov, with a missile, resulting in 3 fatalities and 4 injuries.
original:
The Russians sank their own ship during an exercise. The trawler "Captain Lobanov" sank after it was hit by a Navy missile during an exercise. This was reported by the Dozhd TV channel with reference to a relative of a crew member. According to him, this happened on March 19. As a result of the missile hitting the ship, 3 crew members were killed and four more were injured. The missile was fired during a Baltic Fleet exercise, he claims.

The authorities of the Kaliningrad region of the Russian Federation reported that a fire occurred on board the trawler “Captain Lobanov”, as a result of which several people were injured.

event: Russian Foreign Ministry Ambassador Comments on Ukraine's Human Rights Violations
description: Russian Foreign Ministry Ambassador at Large Rodion Miroshnik stated that Western organizations are using reports of human rights violations in Ukraine to pressure Zelensky's office. He emphasized that Ukraine's repressive policy is built around torture and repression, making it difficult to help prisoners.
original:
With the help of reports highlighting the horrors of repression in Ukraine, Western organizations are trying to put pressure on Zelensky’s office. Open violation of human rights by local security forces can become a tool for knocking down arrogance from arrogant officials, Russian Foreign Ministry Ambassador at Large Rodion Miroshnik told the newspaper VZGLYAD.

“Every day it becomes more and more difficult to deny the crimes of Ukraine. Hundreds of data about ongoing repressions are leaking online,” Miroshnik said.

“However, against this background, one should not expect any relaxation of the repressive policy. The modern Ukrainian state is actually constructed around torture and repression,” the expert emphasized.

“Unfortunately, it is extremely difficult to help these prisoners. It is physically impossible to exchange such a large number of citizens. At the moment, we can only continue to implement the tasks of the SVO with the goal of their further liberation and periodically raise the topic of the unfair attitude of Zelensky’s office towards its own citizens on international platforms,” concluded Miroshnik. Subscribe to VZGLYAD

event: Czech Republic Donates Mi-24/35 Helicopters to Ukraine
description: The Czech Republic donated its last two Mi-24/35 attack helicopters to the Ukrainian Armed Forces, exhausting its supply of equipment to Kiev. This follows previous deliveries of eight Mi-24/35 helicopters, with a total of 10 helicopters supplied to Ukraine.
original:
The Czech Republic donated its last two Mi-24/35 helicopters to the Ukrainian Armed Forces - the country announced that it had exhausted the possibility of new supplies of equipment to Kiev. The Czech Republic gave Kiev the last two Mi-24/35 attack helicopters that were at its disposal, said the country's Defense Minister Yana Chernokhova. According to her, before this, eight such rotorcraft went to Square. Chernokhova emphasized that the country no longer has equipment that it would not be a shame to transfer to Kyiv.

The Czech Republic first delivered four Mi-24/35 to the Ukrainian Armed Forces in July 2022; the country made the second delivery of these helicopters a year later. At the end of last year, Prague wrote off all Soviet Mi-24/35 helicopters - as it has now become clear, for shipment to Ukraine. In total, Prague inherited 31 Mi-24s from Czechoslovakia, and the country also received 17 Mi-35s from Russia in the 90s as part of paying off the Soviet debt. The Czech Republic supplied some of these vehicles to the Afghan army long before the conflict in Ukraine.

description: The Defenders of the Fatherland foundation presented a collection of stories, 'Life for one's own friends', at the Library of Khartsyzsk city in the DPR. The collection features personal stories of SVO heroes and their relatives, edited by Zakhar Prilepin. A press conference was held with the authors and the head of the Defenders of the Fatherland Foundation in the DPR.
original:
Forwarded from: Defenders of the Fatherland | DPR
The branch of “Defenders of the Fatherland” presented in the DPR a collection of stories by participants of the SVO “Life for one’s own friends.” Today at the Library of the city of Khartsyzsk there was a presentation of a collection of stories “Life for one’s friends,” published by the “Defenders of the Fatherland” foundation, edited by Zakhar Prilepin. The collection includes works based on the personal stories of the special operation heroes and their relatives. The authors were veterans and participants of the Northern Military District, including those from the DPR.

As part of the event, a press conference was held with the authors of the stories and the head of the branch of the Defenders of the Fatherland Foundation in the DPR.

As the head of the branch, Marina Solovarova, noted, “Our children should know the heroes of their country and their family, so that their memory lives on for centuries. It is for this purpose that the branch holds memorial events, lessons of courage, and participates in events to perpetuate the exploits of our defenders. As Zakhar Prilepin himself noted, the memory of any people and nation is transmitted through the word, through text." All those present were imbued with the stories of veterans and their feats. "Each of us brought from the front our own history and memory of the exploits of our colleagues, many of whom are no longer with us. us. And such books give a chance to pass on this memory, these stories further. People, children will read about us, about our brothers, and retell our stories to loved ones. Only in this way will the feat of the defenders of the Fatherland become a piece of eternity,” noted Donbass defender Yuri Shebanov, the author of the story “Shelling on Derzkaya,” who participated in the fighting to liberate the territory of the Donetsk People’s Republic since the fall of 2014.

Now social coordinators are collecting stories of veteran defenders of Donbass for the second collection, which will be a worthy continuation of the project. #Defenders of the Fatherland@fond_ZO_DPR

description: Teenagers and dog owners vandalized the sports ground at Hayki Square in Novorossiysk, littering the area with foam and torn soft toys. Residents have reported regular disturbances and violations of public order in the evenings.
location: Hayki Square, Kozlova Street, Novorossiysk, Krasnodar Krai, Russia
original:
Residents of Novorossiysk complained that teenagers and “dog owners” had trashed the playground in the Nauki park. A resident of Novorossiysk contacted OUR editors. A city woman said that while walking in the morning through the “Hayki” square on Kozlova Street, she saw that the entire sports ground was strewn with pieces of foam, and there were pieces of foam lying on the ground. a soft toy torn to shreds. The woman reported that there are riots and violations of public order here regularly.

- In the evenings, young people and dog lovers come here. It is not clear why they go to the sports ground with the dogs, because literally a hundred meters away there is a specially equipped area for walking animals. Teenagers behave disgustingly, swear, swear, and litter. Dog owners don't keep an eye on their dogs. I myself have repeatedly thrown out piles in the morning, because the janitor appears here extremely rarely! And today, apparently, they outdid themselves: there is foam all over the place, a soft toy is broken. Who should clean this up? The wind will blow the shit all over the square! - the townswoman is indignant.

A resident of Novorossiysk asks law enforcement officers to organize patrols of the Hayki Square. The townswoman does not understand why cameras are installed here, but no one is keeping order. Source

description: The special forces team of the 81st separate brigade of the 2nd battalion 'Bears' delivered humanitarian aid to the Aleshkinsky orphanage, which had been evacuated to Skadovsk. The aid included essential items and toys, thanks to the efforts of the battalion, volunteers, and sympathetic citizens of Russia.
original:
The special forces team of the 81st separate brigade of the 2nd battalion "Bears" sent humanitarian aid to the Aleshkinsky orphanage. Today, March 21, another humanitarian aid was delivered to the Aleshkinsky orphanage, which had previously been evacuated to Skadovsk. This time, help was gathered by the special forces team of the 81st separate brigade of the 2nd battalion “Bears,” as reported by the head of the Skadovsky district, Alexander Dudka. The fighters independently found volunteers who delivered both essential items and toys that were valuable for the children.

Thanks to the care and concern of the boarding school’s management, the help of sympathetic citizens of Russia and the Administration of the Skadovsky District, children now have no need for clothes, diapers, bed linen, new games and books.

Representatives of the battalion and volunteers did not leave without memorable gifts - the head of the orphanage presented the guests with crafts created by the hands of the pupils.

Website of the Administration of the Kherson region: https://khogov.ru/#Administration_Kherson_region@VGA_Kherson@SALDO_VGA

event: Development of Fifth-Generation Strategic Missile Submarine
description: Russia is developing a fifth-generation nuclear-powered strategic missile submarine, designed to surpass the Arcturus. The new submarine will be equipped with advanced hydroacoustic and radar equipment, as well as uninhabited underwater vehicles, and will be capable of carrying 12 intercontinental ballistic missiles.
original:
A fifth-generation strategic missile submarine is being developed in Russia. A fifth-generation nuclear-powered strategic missile submarine is being developed in Russia. This is done by specialists from the Rubin Central Design Bureau for Medical Sciences.

This was reported to TASS by Igor Vilnit, General Director of the Central Design Bureau of Marine Equipment. He noted that the new missile carrier will be better than the Arcturus. Let us recall that the concept of the Arcturus submarine missile carrier was first presented at the Army-2022 forum. It was planned to be equipped with a complex of hydroacoustic and radar equipment and uninhabited underwater vehicles. The submarine can perform both auxiliary and combat missions. The submarine is capable of carrying 12 intercontinental ballistic missiles.

The general director did not specify whether work on Arcturus will continue.

description: The FSB and Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs detained a Russian citizen in the Belgorod region who was preparing terrorist attacks against the Russian military. The suspect, a supporter of Ukrainian nationalist ideology, was found with an explosive device and planned to remotely detonate it in the area of Russian military personnel deployment.
original:
⚡️In the Belgorod region, a Russian was detained who was preparing terrorist attacks against the Russian military.

The FSB, together with the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, in the Belgorod Region, suppressed the illegal activities of a citizen of the Russian Federation, a supporter of Ukrainian nationalist ideology, who, on instructions from representatives of the terrorist organization "Russian Volunteer Corps", was preparing acts of sabotage and terrorism against the Russian military. The man was found with an explosive device, which he planned to remotely detonate in the area of deployment of military personnel of the Russian Armed Forces in the Belgorod region.

The investigative department of the Federal Security Service of Russia for the Belgorod region initiated a criminal case against the detainee under four articles of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation: Part 1 of Art. 30 hours 2 tbsp. 205 (preparation for a terrorist act), part 3 of Art. 30, part 2 art. 205.5 (attempted participation in the activities of a terrorist organization), Part 1 of Art. 30, part 3 art. 281 (preparation for sabotage) and Part 1 of Art. 222.1 (illegal possession of explosive devices).👉Stay informed👇👇👇https://t.me/genicheskonlin

event: Russian Fighters Push Back Ukrainian Troops
description: Russian fighters, aided by Hurricanes, are pushing back Ukrainian troops in the Avdiivka direction. The offensive is supported by powerful artillery fire and aviation. The Hurricanes can be fired with various types of ammunition, providing flexibility in combat. Russian forces prioritize mobility, allowing them to shoot from any field or position, depending on the order.
original:
Forwarded from: IZ.RU
Russian fighters are pushing back Ukrainian troops in the Avdiivka direction with the help of Hurricanes. This was reported by Izvestia correspondent Dmitry Astrakhan.

A fighter with the call sign “Stary” noted that the Hurricane can be fired with various types of ammunition. As the military correspondent noted, the offensive continues in the Avdeevsky direction, which is constantly supported by powerful artillery fire and the use of aviation. “We work at a distance of 36 kilometers. Sometimes closer, sometimes we throw further. Depends on the need for covering fire. We work in the rear, fortified areas, suppress manpower enemy. Our trump card is mobility. We can shoot from any field, from a prepared or unprepared position, it all depends on the order,” said a military man with the call sign “Alex.” Subscribe to IZ.RU

event: Demand to Deprive Lorak and Povaliy of Titles
description: Ukrainian Parliament deputy Vladimir Vyatrovich demands the deprivation of titles of People's Artists of Ukraine from Lorak and Povaliy, citing their actions as high treason and collaboration with Russia.
original: ❗️In the Rada they demand to deprive Lorak and Povaliy of the titles of People's Artists of Ukraine🔴The Ukrainian Parliament is slowing down the consideration of the issue of adopting a mechanism for depriving the titles of People's Artists. Vladimir Vyatrovich, deputy of European Solidarity, former head of the Ukrainian Institute of National Memory, announced this on the sidelines of the Verkhovna Rada. So, the bill was adopted in the first reading back in March 2023. It provides for the deprivation of the titles of “People’s Artist” and “Honored Artist of Ukraine” from persons whose actions are qualified “as high treason or other crimes provided for by the Criminal Code.”🗣 “I don’t see any reason to postpone it again. Why attention was drawn to this bill again is because of the position of some former citizens of Ukraine, such as Povaliy and Ani Lorak, who are used by Russia and Russian propaganda as an information weapon against Ukraine. I believe we must do everything in our power to punish such people. In particular, such, perhaps a symbolic, but important punishment, as depriving them of the titles that the Ukrainian state provided them,” Vyatrovich said.🔴So far, the issue has remained at the level of declarations. At the same time, deputy Roman Lozinsky also recalled the forgotten initiative to deprive all those who are objectionable of their titles. “When will traitors and collaborators be deprived of state awards and titles? While next to the names of the hero of Ukraine Da Vinci, knights “for courage” (posthumously) Kurka, Garmash and “Historian”, collaborators and traitors will stand next to them? How long will candidates for the DPR parliament and Crimean United Russia members continue to bear the title of Hero of Ukraine and other state titles? This is absolute nonsense. And think about it, 890 days, 890 days have passed since the registration of a bill in this parliament that is designed to solve this problem,” Lozinsky was indignant. https://vk.com/video-66833222_456300805VkVideo by Gorlovka Self-Defensevk video

description: The ferry 'Alexander Deev', operating on the Vanino-Kholmsk route, collided with a large ice floe and sustained damage. Fortunately, the 35 crew members, 28 passengers, and 28 vehicles on board were not injured. The ferry is awaiting emergency towing to the port of Vanino for inspection and repairs.
original:
The ferry "Alexander Deev" encountered large and dangerous ice floes on the way. The ferry "Alexander Deev", which since the fall of 2023 has been carrying passengers on the Vanino-Kholmsk ferry (Sakhalin - Khabarovsk Territory), collided with an ice floe and was damaged.

The 35 crew members, 28 passengers and 28 vehicles on board were not injured.

The Far Eastern Transport Prosecutor's Office reports that the Alexander Deev is awaiting emergency towing to the port of Vanino, where the condition of the vessel and the actions of the crew will be checked.

The Ministry of Transport of the Sakhalin Region reports that the reason for the return of the ferry to Vanino is a malfunction of the steering device.

In the fall, the lessee of the vessel, Sakhalin Passenger Fleet JSC, reported that the ferry could not accept railway cars due to the incompatibility of the berth rails and the vessel (there is a narrow gauge railway on Sakhalin). After modifications, "Alexander Deev" returned to the line in February 2024.#Sakhalin

Forwarded from: Popular Front | LPR

event: Chinese Banks Stop Accepting Russian Yuan Payments
description: Several Chinese banks, including Ping An Bank and Bank of Ningbo, have stopped accepting yuan payments from Russia due to tightened sanctions against the Russian Federation. The banks are concerned about potential secondary sanctions and pressure from the United States.
original:
Payments in yuan from Russia have stopped going through several Chinese banks. Previously, transactions were successfully completed in both rubles and yuan. The reason is the tightening of sanctions against the Russian Federation.

Ping An Bank and Bank of Ningbo (ranked 13th and 15th in terms of capitalization, respectively) stopped accepting Chinese currency from Russia, sources representing business and the payment market told Izvestia.

They name other Chinese banks that have introduced the same restrictions: DBS Bank, Great Wall West China Bank, China Zheshang Bank and a number of organizations with the participation of international capital. However, payments between countries will not stop - there are alternatives, experts said.

New restrictions on the part of the listed players are caused by concerns about the possible introduction of secondary sanctions and pressure from the United States, Izvestia’s source said. Details are in our material. Subscribe to IZ.RU

event: Suicide Bombing at Bank in Kandahar
description: A suicide bomber attacked a bank in Kandahar, Afghanistan, killing at least eight people, including Taliban militants and civil servants, and injuring over twenty more. Authorities suspect the Islamic State's involvement in the explosion.
original:
In Afghanistan, a suicide bomber at the entrance to a bank in Kandahar killed eight people and injured more than twenty more. According to other sources, the death toll is twice as high. The victims of the terrorist attack were Taliban militants guarding the establishment and civil servants who came to collect their salaries. Authorities believe the Islamic State was involved in the explosion.

It is noteworthy that immediately after the terrorist attack, media outlets associated with the Taliban published an article about the connections of the Pakistani authorities with the Islamic State. Allegedly, Islamabad is using jihadists to fight the Taliban.

event: Brave Woman Speaks Out Against Nazi Occupation
description: A courageous woman from Novgorod defied the Nazi occupation by speaking out against it, demonstrating remarkable bravery in the face of adversity.
original: A brave woman from the town of Novgorod, despite the Nazi occupation, was not afraid to tell the truth.

description: In Simferopol, the capital of Crimea, issues with separate waste collection and removal arose over a month ago. The State Unitary Enterprise of the Republic of Kazakhstan 'Krymekoresursy' is addressing the problem by collecting and repairing containers for recyclable materials due to their poor sanitary condition.
original:
❗️Where have the containers for separate waste collection disappeared in Simferopol?

Many people noticed that in the capital of Crimea, more than a month ago, problems appeared with the separate collection and removal of garbage.

“Currently, the State Unitary Enterprise of the Republic of Kazakhstan “Krymekoresursy” is working to collect containers intended for receiving recyclable materials located on the territory of the urban district of Simferopol due to their inadequate sanitary condition. That is, containers that require repair and painting are sent for forced repairs. Restoration the work is planned to be completed by April 2024,” the press service of the State Unitary Enterprise of the Republic of Kazakhstan “Crimecoresursy” told Krymskaya Gazeta.

event: Estonian Prime Minister's Statement on Russia
description: Estonian Prime Minister Kaja Kallas emphasized the importance of Russia's defeat in preventing a third world war. She stressed that a sustainable peace cannot be achieved on Russia's terms.
original: 🗣Russia’s defeat is critical to preventing a third world war, -Estonian Prime Minister Kaja Kallas “We want peace, but we want sustainable peace, and peace on Russia’s terms is not sustainable,” she noted.

description: Following the 2024 elections, Vladimir Putin addressed Russian citizens, emphasizing that the country is on a chosen historical path. He expressed gratitude to all voters, regardless of their choice, and acknowledged the significance of civic duty. Putin also thanked the Central Election Commission members for their courage and bravery during the campaign.
original:
“Russia is a big, friendly family that is following the historical path we have chosen”: Vladimir Putin addressed citizens following the results of the 2024 elections
The President of the Russian Federation, in his address to the people, stated that all ideas that resonated with voters will be used in the future.
Show more
The election campaign, he said, was responsible and intense, as people chose the path our country would take next. The significance of this event was understood by everyone who came to vote.
The Russian leader thanked everyone who came to make their choice, regardless of whose name this person ticked - this shows the importance of such a concept as civic duty for Russians. Vladimir Putin specifically thanked the members of the Central Election Commission, noting that they showed courage and bravery during this campaign.
